page.title: 15STRAWBERRY FAIR
page.content: STRAWBERRY FAIR IS HELD ANNUALLY ON MIDSUMMER COMMON. THIS YEAR I HAD A BOUNCE ON THE INFLATABLES AND CLIMBED THE RIGGING OF THE PIRATE SHIP. PAUL SAW A PUPPET SHOW AND NATHAN SAW A PUPPETEER WHO HAD PUPPETS FASTENED TO HIS LEGS. WHEN THE MAN JIGGED ABOUT, THE PUPPETS DANCED. THERE WAS A CLOWN DOING TRICKS AND WHEN HE ASKED THE SPECTATORS TO JOIN IN, PAUL BLEW THE TROMBONE. A FIRE-EATER PUT A BURNING TORCH INTO HIS MOUTH, THEN BLEW OUT GREAT FLAMES. A SWORD SWALLOWER WAS BUSY EATING BLADES AND ALLEN WAS WATCHING A JUGGLER TOSSING SKITTLES INTO THE AIR. SUSI HAD A RIDE ON A DONKEY AND SEVERAL OF THE GIRLS SPENT A LONG TIME LOOKING AROUND THE STALLS. THEY BOUGHT BRACELETS AND CLOTHES. ELIZABETH HAD HER FACE PAINTED WITH A RAINBOW AND CLOUDS. THERE WAS PLENTY OF FOOD AND DRINK TO BUY.
